description: Defines a custom exception class 'InvalidBankingUserException' which extends 'SimpleBankingGlobalException'. This class appears to be used for representing specific errors related to invalid banking user operations within the internet banking application.

classes.name: InvalidBankingUserException
classes.description: Custom exception class for invalid banking user scenarios, extending a global exception base class.

methods.name: InvalidBankingUserException
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the exception with a message and a code, passing them to the superclass.
